subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Randy Dunning’s visit to Camden Yards in May was a chance to do “one last fun thing” before reporting to Officer Candidate School. Thanks to Manny Ramirez, he’ll never forget the game.
snippet: Randy Dunning’s visit to Camden Yards in May was a chance to do “one last fun thing” before reporting to Officer Candidate School. Thanks to Manny Ramirez, he’ll never forget the game.
